events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's mention of wanting a refund or exchange.
Support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item delivered.
Hello, I’m Julia from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I’ll assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue for the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method, and you do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the help! I appreciate that I don’t need to send back the wrong item and the refund process is quick.
The refund has been issued successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is perfect now, thank you for the excellent support.
We are closing this case now, glad we could resolve the issue. Please contact us anytime if needed.
